column2: Wireless calls between Verizon and AT&T; to be carried on data network by 2015 WASHINGTON
column3: Nov 3 Verizon Communications  and AT&T; Inc expect to be able to transmit wireless voice calls between the two carriers over high-speed data networks by 2015
column4: the companies said on Monday.

column2: Boston Scientific faces first federal transvaginal mesh trialsBoston Scientific faces first federal transvaginal mesh trials Boston Scientific Corp on Monday was set to face its first federal trials in two courts over claims from women who say they were injured by the companys transvaginal mesh devices.
